message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $150.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $135.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Would you be willing to consider that price?
I can see you're a tough negotiator, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $130. This is my final offer, so think carefully before making your next move.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go to $130. I'm willing to meet you at $128. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
